title: The One With the Stoned Guy

questions.question: What does Rachel hand to Joey at Central Perk?
questions.correct_answer: Coffee
questions.explanation: Rachel serves Joey his coffee.

questions.question: What is Monica's drink of choice at Central Perk?
questions.correct_answer: Hot cider
questions.explanation: Monica is served a nice hot cider by Rachel.

questions.question: Why does Chandler quit his job?
options: He didn't want to be a data processor
questions.correct_answer: He didn't want to be a data processor
questions.explanation: Chandler quits because he doesn't want to admit data processing is his actual job.

questions.question: What does Phoebe suggest Chandler do after quitting his job?
questions.correct_answer: Be a chef
questions.explanation: Phoebe suggests Chandler become a head chef for her new client Steve's restaurant.

questions.question: What is the name of Ross's date?
questions.correct_answer: Celia
questions.explanation: Ross's date is Celia, the curator of insects at the museum.

questions.question: What is Celia's profession?
questions.correct_answer: Curator of insects
questions.explanation: Celia is the curator of insects at the museum.

questions.question: What is the name of the song playing in Ross's apartment?
options: Girl, You'll Be A Woman Soon
questions.correct_answer: Girl, You'll Be A Woman Soon
questions.explanation: The song playing in Ross's apartment is 'Girl, You'll Be A Woman Soon'.

questions.question: What does Ross want to do to Joey?
options: Feel his hot, soft skin with his lips
Run his tongue all over his body
questions.correct_answer: Feel his hot, soft skin with his lips
questions.explanation: Ross wants to feel Joey's hot, soft skin with his lips as part of a dirty talk exercise.

questions.question: What is the result of Steve's dinner at Monica's?
options: He loves the food and wants to hire Monica
He gets drunk and passes out
He gets stoned and causes chaos
He hates the food and leaves
questions.correct_answer: He gets stoned and causes chaos
questions.explanation: Steve gets stoned before dinner and causes chaos at Monica's apartment.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do to Steve as revenge for his behavior?
options: She gives him a painful massage
She refuses to cook for him
She calls the police on him
questions.correct_answer: She gives him a painful massage
questions.explanation: Phoebe gives Steve a painful massage as revenge for his behavior at Monica's dinner party.

questions.question: What is the name of the system Chandler mentions at work?
questions.correct_answer: WENUS
questions.explanation: Chandler mentions the Weekly Estimated Net Usage Systems, or WENUS, at work.

questions.question: What does Chandler do after taking aptitude tests?
questions.correct_answer: He gets a new job
questions.explanation: Chandler gets a new job after taking aptitude tests, despite initially being unhappy with the results.

questions.question: What is Monica's reaction to Steve's behavior at dinner?
options: She is annoyed and tells him to leave
She is concerned and tries to help him
She is indifferent and ignores him
questions.correct_answer: She is annoyed and tells him to leave
questions.explanation: Monica is annoyed with Steve's behavior and eventually tells him that dinner is over.

questions.question: What does Ross want to do with Celia after dinner?
options: He wants to go for a walk
He wants to watch a movie
He wants to introduce her to his monkey
He wants to go back to his place and talk dirty
questions.correct_answer: He wants to go back to his place and talk dirty
questions.explanation: Ross wants to go back to his place and talk dirty with Celia after dinner.

questions.question: What is the name of the restaurant Steve is opening?
questions.correct_answer: None of the above, the name is not specified
questions.explanation: The name of Steve's restaurant is not specified in the episode.

questions.question: What is the outcome of Ross's attempt to talk dirty to Joey?
options: Joey is impressed and turned on
Joey is amused and teases Ross
Joey is uncomfortable and tells Ross to stop
Joey is confused and doesn't understand what Ross is doing
questions.correct_answer: Joey is amused and teases Ross
questions.explanation: Joey is amused by Ross's attempt to talk dirty and teases him about it.

questions.question: What does Chandler learn from his aptitude tests?
options: He is ideally suited for a career in data processing
He is ideally suited for a career in cooking
He is ideally suited for a career in acting
He is ideally suited for a career in music
questions.correct_answer: He is ideally suited for a career in data processing
questions.explanation: Chandler learns that he is ideally suited for a career in data processing, which he is unhappy about.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman who helps Monica with waitressing?
questions.correct_answer: Wendy
questions.explanation: Wendy is the woman who agrees to help Monica with waitressing, but later bails on her.

questions.question: What does Monica pay Rachel to waitress at her dinner party?
questions.correct_answer: 20 dollars an hour
questions.explanation: Monica pays Rachel 20 dollars an hour to waitress at her dinner party.

questions.question: What is the result of Steve's actions at Monica's dinner party?
options: Monica is impressed and offers him a job
Monica is annoyed and tells him to leave
Monica is confused and doesn't understand what is happening
Monica is amused and laughs at Steve's antics
questions.correct_answer: Monica is annoyed and tells him to leave
questions.explanation: Monica is annoyed with Steve's behavior and eventually tells him that dinner is over.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do to help Monica with her dinner party?
options: She brings a guest, Steve, to the dinner party
She provides entertainment for the guests
questions.correct_answer: She brings a guest, Steve, to the dinner party
questions.explanation: Phoebe brings Steve, her massage client, to Monica's dinner party.

questions.question: What is the name of the song that Ross and Celia are listening to when they are kissing?
options: Girl, You'll Be A Woman Soon
questions.correct_answer: Girl, You'll Be A Woman Soon
questions.explanation: The song playing when Ross and Celia are kissing is 'Girl, You'll Be A Woman Soon'.

questions.question: What does Chandler say to his boss, Mr. Kostelic, on the phone?
questions.correct_answer: He declines the job offer
questions.explanation: Chandler declines the job offer from Mr. Kostelic, telling him that he is not interested in the position.

questions.question: What is the final outcome of Chandler's job search?
options: He gets a new job in data processing
He decides to pursue a career in acting

questions.explanation: Chandler eventually gets a new job in data processing, despite his initial reluctance.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Celia when she asks him to talk dirty?
options: He says something romantic and sweet
He says something funny and joking
He says something awkward and embarrassing
questions.correct_answer: He says the word 'vulva'
questions.explanation: Ross says the word 'vulva' when Celia asks him to talk dirty, which is an awkward and embarrassing moment.

questions.question: What is the name of the cereal that Steve finds in Monica's kitchen?
questions.correct_answer: Sugar-O's
questions.explanation: Steve finds a box of Sugar-O's in Monica's kitchen.

questions.question: What does Steve do with the Sugar-O's?
options: He uses them to make a craft project
He throws them into the punch bowl
questions.correct_answer: He throws them into the punch bowl
questions.explanation: Steve throws the Sugar-O's into the punch bowl, causing chaos and mess.
